Content_FullWidth.Name: Christmas Gathering
Content_FullWidth.Title: Christmas Gathering
Content_FullWidth.BodyCopy:
With the Christmas season once again upon us, President Clark and the members of President's Executive Group want to take a moment to express their love and appreciation for the great work you do at BYU-Idaho. Please join them for a special Christmas gathering on Thursday, December 13, anytime between 10 a.m. and 12:30 p.m. in the Taylor Cultural Hall.

Refreshments will be served. Note cards will be available for you to write a Christmas greeting or an expression of gratitude to anyone on campus. The notes will then be delivered on your behalf. As a token of gratitude, all those who attend will receive a Christmas pie to enjoy during the holiday season. 

President Clark and the members of President's Executive Group look forward to spending this time with you.
